sections.title: Like Fin\bin\t a Nee\b\fe in a Haystack: Annotatin\t the American Nationa\f Corpus for I\biomatic Expressions   Laura Street, Nathan Micha\fov, Rache\f Si\fverstein, Michae\f Reyno\f\bs, Lur\bes Rue\fa, Fe\ficia F\fowers, An\te\fa Ta\fucci, Prisci\f\fa Pereira, Gabrie\f\fa Mor\ton, Samantha Sie\te\f, Marci Barousse, Antequa An\berson, Tashom Carro\f\f, Anna Fe\f\bman
paragraphs: Montcl_b_tr St_bt_f Un_tv_frs_tty 1 Norm_bl Av_fnu_f, Montcl_b_tr, N_fw J_frs_fy, 07043, USA

{str_f_ftl1, m_tch_blovn1, s_tlv_frst_f_tr2, f_fldm_bn_b}@m_b_tl.montcl_b_tr._fdu Abstract Th_ts p_bp_fr pr_fs_fnts th_f d_ft_b_tls of _b p_tlot study _tn wh_tch w_f t_bgg_fd port_tons of th_f Am_fr_tc_bn N_bt_ton_bl Corpus (ANC) for _td_toms compos_fd of v_frb-noun construct_tons, pr_fpos_tt_ton_bl phr_bs_fs, _bnd subord_tn_bt_f cl_bus_fs. Th_f thr_f_f d_bt_b s_fts w_f _bn_blyz_fd _tnclud_fd 1,500-s_fnt_fnc_f s_bmpl_fs from th_f spok_fn, th_f non-f_tct_ton, _bnd th_f f_tct_ton port_tons of th_f ANC. Th_ts p_bp_fr prov_td_fs th_f d_ft_b_tls of th_f t_bgs_ft w_f d_fv_flop_fd, th_f mot_tv_bt_ton b_fh_tnd our cho_tc_fs, _bnd th_f _tnt_fr-_bnnot_btor _bgr_f_fm_fnt m_f_bsur_fs w_f d_f_fm_fd _bppropr_t_bt_f for th_ts t_bsk. In t_bgg_tng th_f ANC for _td_tom_bt_tc _fxpr_fss_tons, our _bnnot_btors _bch_t_fv_fd _b h_tgh l_fv_fl of _bgr_f_fm_fnt (> .80) on th_f t_bgs but _b low l_fv_fl of _bgr_f_fm_fnt (< .00) on wh_bt const_ttut_fd _bn _td_tom. Th_fs_f f_tnd_tngs support th_f cl_b_tm th_bt _td_fnt_tfy_tng _td_tom_bt_tc _bnd m_ft_bphor_tc_bl _fxpr_fss_tons _ts _b h_tghly d_tff_tcult _bnd subj_fct_tv_f t_bsk. In tot_bl, 135 _td_tom typ_fs _bnd 154 _td_tom tok_fns w_fr_f _td_fnt_tf_t_fd. B_bs_fd on th_f tot_bl tok_fns found for _f_bch _td_tom cl_bss, w_f sugg_fst th_bt futur_f r_fs_f_brch on _td_tom d_ft_fct_ton _bnd _td_tom _bnnot_bt_ton _tnclud_f pr_fpos_tt_ton_bl phr_bs_fs _bs th_ts cl_bss of _td_toms occurr_fd fr_fqu_fntly _tn th_f nonf_tct_ton _bnd spok_fn s_bmpl_fs of our corpus

sections.title: 1. Intro\buction
paragraphs: R_fs_f_brch_frs h_bv_f b_f_fn _tnv_fst_tg_bt_tng _td_toms _bnd th_f_tr prop_frt_t_fs for m_bny y_f_brs. Accord_tng to tr_bd_tt_ton_bl _bppro_bch_fs, _bn _td_tom _ts “_tn _tts s_tmpl_fst form..._b str_tng of two or mor_f words for wh_tch m_f_bn_tng _ts not d_fr_tv_fd from th_f m_f_bn_tngs of th_f _tnd_tv_tdu_bl words compr_ts_tng th_bt str_tng” (Sw_tnn_fy _bnd Cutl_fr, 1979: 523). As such, th_f m_f_bn_tng of to kick th\b \tuck\bt (wh_tch _ts ‘to d_t_f’) c_bnnot b_f obt_b_tn_fd by br_f_bk_tng down th_f _td_tom _bnd _bn_blyz_tng th_f m_f_bn_tngs of _tts const_ttu_fnt p_brts, to kick _bnd th\b \tuck\bt. In _bdd_tt_ton to b_f_tng _tnflu_fnc_fd by th_f pr_tnc_tpl_f of compos_tt_ton_bl_tty, th_f tr_bd_tt_ton_bl _bppro_bch_fs _br_f _blso _tnflu_fnc_fd by th_for_t_fs of g_fn_fr_bt_tv_f gr_bmm_br (Flor_fs d’Arc_b_ts, 1993: 80-82; L_bnglotz, 2006: 15-16). Th_f prop_frt_t_fs th_bt tr_bd_tt_ton_bl _bppro_bch_fs _bttr_tbut_f to _td_tom_bt_tc _fxpr_fss_tons _br_f _blso th_f prop_frt_t_fs th_bt m_bk_f th_fm d_tff_tcult for g_fn_fr_bt_tv_f gr_bmm_brs to d_fscr_tb_f. For _tnst_bnc_f, _td_toms c_bn b_f synt_bct_tc_blly _tll-form_fd (_f.g., \ty \fnd l\frg\b), r_fs_tst_bnt to gr_bmm_bt_tc_bl tr_bnsform_bt_tons (_f.g., th\b \tuck\bt w\fs kick\bd \ty him ≠ ‘h_f d_t_fd’), _tmp_frv_tous to l_fx_tc_bl subst_ttut_tons (_f.g., to kick th\b p\fil ≠ ‘to d_t_f’), _bnd s_fm_bnt_tc_blly _bmb_tguous w_tthout cont_fxt (_f.g., Ch\frl\bs kick\bd th\b \tuck\bt \fnd w\fs \turi\bd l\fst night vs. Ch\frl\bs kick\bd th\b \tuck\bt through th\b window).

In r_fc_fnt y_f_brs, post-g_fn_fr_bt_tv_f _bppro_bch_fs to _td_toms h_bv_f _brgu_fd th_bt _td_toms, l_tk_f _bll l_tngu_tst_tc _fxpr_fss_tons, _br_f _b typ_f of construct_ton. As Goldb_frg (2003: 219) st_bt_fs: “Construct_tons _br_f p_b_tr_tngs of form _bnd funct_ton, _tnclud_tng morph_fm_fs, words, _td_toms, p_brt_t_blly l_fx_tc_blly f_tll_fd _bnd fully g_fn_fr_bl l_tngu_tst_tc p_btt_frns.” To b_f mor_f pr_fc_ts_f, _b construct_ton _ts _bny l_tngu_tst_tc p_btt_frn wh_fr_f _bn _bsp_fct of _tts form or funct_ton _ts unpr_fd_tct_bbl_f b_bs_fd on _tts compon_fnt p_brts or oth_fr known construct_tons. Wh_fn conduct_tng r_fs_f_brch on _td_tom_bt_tc _fxpr_fss_tons, _b construct_ton_tst _bppro_bch _ts _bdv_bnt_bg_fous b_fc_bus_f _tt s_f_fks to d_fscr_tb_f l_bngu_bg_f _tn g_fn_fr_bl. Th_bt _ts to s_by, _tt do_fs not d_tsr_fg_brd unusu_bl l_tngu_tst_tc ph_fnom_fn_b (such _bs _td_toms) b_fc_bus_f th_fy _br_f ‘p_fr_tph_fr_bl’ r_bth_fr th_bn p_brt of th_f ‘cor_f’ of l_bngu_bg_f. Construct_ton_tst _bppro_bch_fs _br_f _blso b_fn_ff_tc_t_bl b_fc_bus_f th_fy cl_b_tm th_bt construct_tons _br_f _bcqu_tr_fd b_bs_fd on th_f_tr fr_fqu_fncy _tn th_f _tnput _bnd th_ts works w_fll w_tth _b corpus-b_bs_fd _bppro_bch wh_fr_f d_bt_b _bnd fr_fqu_fncy counts _br_f us_fd to c_bptur_f prop_frt_t_fs of l_tngu_tst_tc ph_fnom_fn_b such _bs colloc_bt_tons, mult_t-word _fxpr_fss_tons, _ftc. For _b mor_f d_ft_b_tl_fd d_tscuss_ton of th_f _bppro_bch w_f t_bk_f to _td_toms _tn th_ts p_bp_fr, pl_f_bs_f r_ff_fr to (Goldb_frg, 2003). T_bbl_f 1. Ex_bmpl_fs of construct_tons (_bd_bpt_fd from Goldb_frg 2003: 220)

Pr_fv_tous work on _butom_bt_tc _td_tom cl_bss_tf_tc_bt_ton h_bs typ_tc_blly b_f_fn of two typ_fs: thos_f wh_tch m_bk_f us_f of typ_f-b_bs_fd cl_bss_tf_tc_bt_ton m_fthods (L_tn, 1999; B_bldw_tn _ft _bl. 2003; F_bzly _bnd St_fv_fnson, 2006; B_bnn_brd, 2007; F_bzly _ft _bl., 2009) _bnd thos_f wh_tch m_bk_f us_f of tok_fn-b_bs_fd cl_bss_tf_tc_bt_ton m_fthods (B_trk_f _bnd S_brk_br,

2006; K_btz _bnd G_t_fsbr_fcht, 2006; F_bzly _ft _bl., 2009; Sporl_fd_fr _bnd L_t, 2009). Typ_f-b_bs_fd cl_bss_tf_tc_bt_ton m_fthods g_fn_fr_blly r_fly on th_f not_ton th_bt m_bny _td_toms sh_br_f un_tqu_f prop_frt_t_fs w_tth on_f _bnoth_fr. For _tnst_bnc_f, s_fv_fr_bl _td_toms _br_f compos_fd of v_frb-noun construct_tons (_f.g., \tr\b\fk \f l\bg, g\bt \f grip, kick th\b \tuck\bt) th_bt c_bnnot b_f _blt_fr_fd synt_bct_tc_blly or l_fx_tc_blly (_f.g., *\tr\b\fk \f skinny l\bg, *\f grip w\fs got, *kick th\b p\fil). Th_fs_f un_tqu_f prop_frt_t_fs _br_f us_fd to d_tst_tngu_tsh _td_tom_bt_tc _fxpr_fss_tons from oth_fr typ_fs of _fxpr_fss_tons _tn _b t_fxt. Tok_fn-b_bs_fd cl_bss_tf_tc_bt_ton m_fthods _br_f d_tff_fr_fnt _tn th_bt th_fy m_bk_f us_f of th_f surround_tng cont_fxt _bnd/or s_f_brch for l_fx_tc_bl coh_fs_ton. Wh_fn g_tv_fn _b coh_fs_tv_f t_fxt, s_fnt_fnc_fs _tn on_f p_brt of th_f t_fxt _br_f _bssum_fd to b_f r_fl_bt_fd to s_fnt_fnc_fs _tn _bnoth_fr p_brt of th_f t_fxt. Id_tom_bt_tc _fxpr_fss_tons, th_fr_ffor_f, st_bnd out b_fc_bus_f th_fy _br_f s_fm_bnt_tc_blly unr_fl_bt_fd to th_f surround_tng cont_fxt. To t_bk_f _b s_tmpl_f _fx_bmpl_f, s_fv_fr_bl words _tn th_f follow_tng t_fxt _br_f h_tghl_tght_fd _bs sh_br_tng th_f s_fm_bnt_tc prop_frty [+cold] w_tth th_f und_frl_tn_fd _fxpr_fss_ton. Th_f und_frl_tn_fd _fxpr_fss_ton _ts t_bk_fn to b_f l_tt_fr_bl r_bth_fr th_bn non-l_tt_fr_bl _tn th_ts cont_fxt: H\b h\fd cold f\b\bt whil\b st\fnding in th\b \tus stop, \tut h\b wouldn’t \t\b d\bt\brr\bd \ty th\b fri\bid \fir, th\b c\tillin\b wind, or th\b un\bnding sno\f. If th_f und_frl_tn_fd _fxpr_fss_ton d_td not sh_br_f s_fm_bnt_tc prop_frt_t_fs w_tth th_f words th_bt surround _tt, th_f ch_bnc_fs of _tt b_f_tng non-l_tt_fr_bl would b_f h_tgh.

Wh_tl_f th_f work on _butom_bt_tc _td_tom d_ft_fct_ton h_bs b_f_fn groundbr_f_bk_tng, th_fs_f m_fthods typ_tc_blly h_bv_f two m_bjor l_tm_tt_bt_tons: 1.) th_fy r_fqu_tr_f m_bny r_fsourc_fs such _bs d_tct_ton_br_t_fs _bnd/or _bnnot_bt_fd corpor_b to b_f _tmpl_fm_fnt_fd, _bnd 2.) th_fy _br_f l_tm_tt_fd to d_ft_fct_tng only on_f typ_f of _td_tom (_t._f., v_frb-noun construct_tons). If th_f go_bl _ts to _td_fnt_tfy _bnd _fxtr_bct _td_toms _butom_bt_tc_blly, mor_f work n_f_fds to b_f don_f on oth_fr typ_fs of _td_tom construct_tons. W_f h_bv_f _tn_tt_t_bt_fd th_ts typ_f of r_fs_f_brch by _bnnot_bt_tng th_f ANC for v_br_tous typ_fs of _td_toms. Thus f_br, H_bsh_tmoto & K_bw_bh_br_b (2008) h_bv_f not_fd th_bt th_fr_f _br_f f_fw corpor_b _bnnot_bt_fd for _td_tom_bt_tc _fxpr_fss_tons _fv_fn though r_fs_f_brch_frs h_bv_f t_bk_fn _bn _tnt_fr_fst _tn th_ts top_tc r_fc_fntly. Th_f SAID corpus (Ku_tp_fr _ft _bl., 2003) _bnd th_f TroF_t Ex_bmpl_f B_bs_f (B_trk_f _bnd S_brk_br, 2006), how_fv_fr, _br_f two of th_f f_fw _fx_bmpl_fs _bv_b_tl_bbl_f _tn Engl_tsh. L_tk_f th_f SAID corpus _bnd th_f TroF_t Ex_bmpl_f B_bs_f, th_f corpus w_f d_fv_flop_fd _ts _tnt_fnd_fd to b_f th_f found_bt_ton for _b mor_f _tn-d_fpth study of _td_toms. As such, th_f corpus _ts _b us_fful tool for r_fs_f_brch_frs work_tng _tn th_f f_t_flds of th_for_ft_tc_bl l_tngu_tst_tcs, _bppl_t_fd l_tngu_tst_tcs, _bnd l_bngu_bg_f t_fchnology.

sections.title: 2. Metho\bo\fo\ty
paragraphs: Our s_bmpl_f cons_tst_fd of _bpprox_tm_bt_fly 4,500 s_fnt_fnc_fs (68,915 tok_fns) _fxtr_bct_fd from th_f Am_fr_tc_bn N_bt_ton_bl Corpus (ANC), _b d_fv_flop_tng corpus of Am_fr_tc_bn Engl_tsh curr_fntly cont_b_tn_tng _bpprox_tm_bt_fly 22 m_tll_ton words. W_f chos_f to work w_tth th_f ANC b_fc_bus_f Engl_tsh v_br_t_fs not_bbly from on_f br_bnd to _bnoth_fr _tn l_fx_tcon, phr_bs_tng, s_fm_bnt_tcs, _bnd—most _tmport_bntly for our study—_td_tom_bt_tc _fxpr_fss_tons (F_tllmor_f _ft _bl., 1998), _bnd _bs sp_f_bk_frs of Am_fr_tc_bn Engl_tsh w_f f_flt _tt _tmport_bnt to work w_tth th_f corpus th_bt r_fpr_fs_fnts th_f br_bnd of Engl_tsh w_tth wh_tch w_f _br_f most f_bm_tl_t_br. Furth_frmor_f, wh_tl_f th_f ANC S_fcond R_fl_f_bs_f h_bs _blr_f_bdy b_f_fn _bnnot_bt_fd for word _bnd s_fnt_fnc_f bound_br_t_fs, p_brts-of-sp_f_fch, _bnd noun _bnd v_frb chunks, _tt do_fs not y_ft _tnclud_f _bny _bnnot_bt_tons for f_tgur_bt_tv_f l_bngu_bg_f. 1

Th_f ANC S_fcond R_fl_f_bs_f _tnclud_fs d_bt_b from _b v_br_t_fty of dom_b_tns r_bng_tng from gov_frnm_fnt, _bc_bd_fm_tc, _bnd t_fchn_tc_bl wr_tt_tng to journ_bl _brt_tcl_fs, f_tct_ton, blogs, m_bg_bz_tn_fs, _bnd spok_fn _tnt_frv_t_fws. Although th_f corpus _bs _b whol_f w_tll not b_f cons_td_fr_fd b_bl_bnc_fd unt_tl _tt _ts compl_ft_f,2

w_f s_fl_fct_fd _b s_bmpl_f th_bt w_f b_fl_t_fv_f r_fpr_fs_fnts _b w_td_f r_bng_f of _td_tom_bt_tc l_bngu_bg_f. Approx_tm_bt_fly on_f th_trd of our s_bmpl_f d_bt_b com_fs from th_f wr_ttt_fn nonf_tct_ton dom_b_tn, on_f th_trd com_fs from tr_bnscr_tb_fd spok_fn n_brr_bt_tv_fs, _bnd on_f th_trd com_fs from wr_ttt_fn f_tct_ton. In _b tr_t_bl run of th_f study, th_f _bnnot_btors _td_fnt_tf_t_fd _bnd t_bgg_fd _td_toms _tn _b 111-s_fnt_fnc_f s_bmpl_f (1644 tok_fns) _bccord_tng to th_f t_bgs_ft _fl_bbor_bt_fd b_flow. Aft_fr th_f tr_t_bl run, th_f _bnnot_btors d_tscuss_fd th_f numb_frs _bnd typ_fs of _td_tom_bt_tc _fxpr_fss_tons th_fy found _bnd r_f-_fv_blu_bt_fd th_f t_bgs_ft, ult_tm_bt_fly d_fc_td_tng to us_f th_f s_bm_f t_bgs_ft for th_f p_tlot study _bs th_fy h_bd us_fd for th_f tr_t_bl run. For th_f p_tlot study, th_f _bnnot_btors t_bgg_fd _b 4,500-s_fnt_fnc_f s_bmpl_f _tn th_f s_bm_f m_bnn_fr _bs th_f tr_t_bl run. Th_f _bnnot_btors work_fd _tnd_tv_tdu_blly, but thr_f_f or four w_fr_f _bss_tgn_fd to _f_bch s_bmpl_f. Th_f t_bsk w_bs compl_ft_fd _tn roughly s_tx to t_fn hours.

To _fxp_bnd upon th_f work of pr_fv_tous stud_t_fs _bnd to f_bc_tl_tt_bt_f futur_f work _tn th_f _br_f_b of _butom_bt_tc _td_tom d_ft_fct_ton, w_f d_fv_flop_fd _b t_bgs_ft compr_ts_fd of thr_f_f t_bgs. Our t_bgs_ft _tnclud_fd t_bgs for _td_toms compos_fd of v_frb-noun construct_tons (VNCs), pr_fpos_tt_ton_bl phr_bs_fs (PPs), _bnd subord_tn_bt_f cl_bus_fs (SCs). W_f _tnclud_fd l_fss prototyp_tc_bl structur_fs such _bs PPs _bnd SCs b_fc_bus_f on_f of our go_bls w_bs to _tllustr_bt_f th_f m_bny c_bs_fs of f_tgur_bt_tv_f l_bngu_bg_f th_bt _br_f m_tss_fd by _bppro_bch_fs th_bt focus _fxclus_tv_fly on _td_toms cont_b_tn_tng s_fl_fct v_frbs.  Ta\ts Examp\fes  <PP> ... </PP> \ft d\b\fth’s door, to \f f\fult  <VN> ... </VN> p\fss th\b \tuck, l\b\frn th\b rop\bs  <SC> ... </SC> wh\bn h\bll fr\b\bz\bs ov\br, if th\b pric\b is right  T_bbl_f 2. Th_f t_bgs_ft w_tth _fx_bmpl_fs  In _bn _fffort to m_bk_f th_f t_bgg_tng proc_fss mor_f _fff_tc_t_fnt _bnd r_fl_t_bbl_f, w_f l_tm_tt_fd our t_bgs_ft to _b v_fry sm_bll numb_fr of t_bgs _bnd g_bv_f our _bnnot_btors th_f follow_tng gu_td_fl_tn_fs: 1.) Alw_bys t_bg for th_f n_brrow_fst scop_f poss_tbl_f, 2.) Us_f th_f s_bm_f synt_bx throughout th_f _bnnot_bt_ton proc_fss, _bnd 3.) Do not _tnclud_f punctu_bt_ton such _bs p_fr_tods or quot_bt_ton m_brks.

paragraphs: To _fnsur_f r_fl_t_bb_tl_tty of th_f r_fsults two _blph_b scor_fs

sections.title: _U
paragraphs: Do (n-1)∑cOcc - ∑c nc(nc–1) α = 1 - ___ = _____________________ D_f n(n-1) - ∑cnc(nc-1)  Wh_fr_f Do r_fpr_fs_fnts obs_frv_fd d_ts_bgr_f_fm_fnt _bmong th_f _bnnot_btors, D_f _ts th_f d_ts_bgr_f_fm_fnt wh_tch would b_f _fxp_fct_fd to occur _tf t_bgs h_bd b_f_fn s_fl_fct_fd by ch_bnc_f. ∑ _tnd_tc_bt_fs summ_bt_ton of _bll d_bt_b of th_f g_tv_fn typ_f, n r_fpr_fs_fnts th_f numb_fr of _tt_fms _bssoc_t_bt_fd w_tth th_f g_tv_fn subscr_tpt (wh_fr_f no subscr_tpt _ts pr_fs_fnt n _tnd_tc_bt_fs th_f tot_bl numb_fr of t_bgs), _bnd subscr_tpts r_fl_bt_f to th_f co_tnc_td_fnc_f m_btr_tc_fs wh_tch _br_f d_fscr_tb_fd _tn mor_f d_ft_b_tl b_flow.

Kr_tpp_fndorff’s Alph_b w_bs us_fd b_fc_bus_f _tt w_bs _bppropr_t_bt_f for our d_bt_b s_ft. It _ts sp_fc_tf_tc_blly d_fs_tgn_fd to _bn_blyz_f nom_tn_bl d_bt_b s_fts g_fn_fr_bt_fd by mult_tpl_f _bnnot_btors, _tnclud_tng _tnst_bnc_fs wh_fr_f on_f or mor_f _bnnot_btors d_td not prov_td_f _b r_bt_tng for som_f of th_f un_tts _tn th_f d_bt_b s_ft. Wh_tl_f Fl_f_tss’ K_bpp_b _bnd Coh_fn’s K_bpp_b _br_f commonly us_fd to _bn_blyz_f _tnt_fr-_bnnot_btor _bgr_f_fm_fnt, th_fy w_fr_f _tn_bppropr_t_bt_f _tn th_f curr_fnt study _bs Coh_fn’s K_bpp_b c_bn only b_f us_fd w_tth two _bnnot_btors _bnd Fl_f_tss’ K_bpp_b c_bnnot b_f us_fd wh_fn d_bt_b s_fts cont_b_tn un_tts th_bt _br_f not r_bt_fd by _bll of th_f _bnnot_btors.

On_f poss_tbl_f _fxpl_bn_bt_ton for th_f low _tnt_fr-_bnnot_btor _bgr_f_fm_fnt could b_f, _bs som_f stud_t_fs sugg_fst (G_tbbs 1984), th_bt th_fr_f _ts no cl_f_br psycholog_tc_bl d_tst_tnct_ton b_ftw_f_fn l_tt_fr_bl _bnd f_tgur_bt_tv_f _fxpr_fss_tons, so _bnnot_bt_tng for _td_toms _ts _b r_bth_fr d_tff_tcult _bnd subj_fct_tv_f t_bsk, _bnd th_f l_fv_fl of d_ts_bgr_f_fm_fnt our _bnnot_btors d_fmonstr_bt_fd on l_tt_fr_bl-_td_tom _fxpr_fss_tons _ts to b_f _fxp_fct_fd. As on_f m_tght _fxp_fct, most of th_f _bnnot_bt_fd _td_toms occurr_fd _tn th_f f_tct_ton s_bmpl_f. Th_f tot_bl numb_fr of tok_fns _tn th_f f_tct_ton s_bmpl_f (n = 96) w_bs _blmost thr_f_f t_tm_fs th_f tot_bl numb_fr of tok_fns _tn th_f spok_fn s_bmpl_f (n = 33) _bnd _blmost four t_tm_fs th_f tot_bl numb_fr of tok_fns _tn th_f nonf_tct_ton s_bmpl_f (n = 25). V_br_t_bt_tons b_ftw_f_fn f_tct_ton, nonf_tct_ton, _bnd tr_bnscr_tb_fd sp_f_fch _br_f w_fll docum_fnt_fd, so _tt _ts not surpr_ts_tng th_bt mor_f _td_toms occurr_fd _tn th_f f_tct_ton s_bmpl_f. F_tgur_bt_tv_f l_bngu_bg_f just t_fnds to b_f mor_f commonpl_bc_f _tn f_tct_ton. Anoth_fr m_bjor f_tnd_tng w_bs th_bt 79% of th_f _td_toms t_bgg_fd w_fr_f VNCs (n = 122). Wh_bt w_bs surpr_ts_tng, how_fv_fr, w_bs th_bt VNCs _bnd PPs occurr_fd _tn much clos_fr numb_frs _tn both th_f nonf_tct_ton (n = 10, n = 14) _bnd th_f spok_fn s_bmpl_fs (n = 19, n = 12). PPs _blso occurr_fd roughly 4.3 t_tm_fs mor_f _tn th_f nonf_tct_ton _bnd spok_fn s_bmpl_fs th_bn _tn th_f f_tct_ton s_bmpl_f. Th_fs_f f_tnd_tngs _tnd_tc_bt_f th_bt m_bny _td_toms _br_f m_tss_fd wh_fn r_fs_f_brch_frs _bnnot_bt_f t_fxts sol_fly for VNCs— p_brt_tcul_brly _tf thos_f t_fxts com_f from g_fnr_fs oth_fr th_bn f_tct_ton. On_f poss_tbl_f _fxpl_bn_bt_ton for why VNCs outnumb_fr PPs _tn th_f f_tct_ton dom_b_tn _ts th_bt nov_fl f_tgur_bt_tv_f l_bngu_bg_f, wh_tch t_fnds to occur mor_f fr_fqu_fntly _tn f_tct_ton, _ts l_tk_fly to t_bk_f th_f form of _b VNC r_bth_fr th_bn _b PP. Mor_f r_fs_f_brch n_f_fds to b_f don_f, how_fv_fr, to _fxpl_b_tn why VNCs occur mor_f fr_fqu_fntly th_bn PPs _tn th_ts dom_b_tn. F_tn_blly, s_tnc_f th_fr_f w_fr_f so f_fw _tnst_bnc_fs of SCs, w_f r_fcomm_fnd th_bt futur_f r_fs_f_brch on _td_tom d_ft_fct_ton pr_tor_tt_tz_f oth_fr typ_fs of construct_tons ov_fr SCs. In p_brt_tcul_br, v_frb + pr_fpos_tt_ton_bl phr_bs_f construct_tons (VPPCs) _bpp_f_br to b_f _b good c_bnd_td_bt_f _bs s_fv_fr_bl of our _bnnot_btors not_fd h_tgh_fr _tnst_bnc_fs of th_fm wh_tl_f t_bgg_tng.
